summary: A collection of Django test cases that verify core authentication model functionality, including user and abstract user behavior, password hashing upgrades, email handling, active status defaults, natural key serialization, data loading across databases, group associations, and post‑save signal processing for regular and superuser creation.
business_intent: Validate that authentication‑related models and managers operate correctly, ensuring reliable user creation, password management, email normalization, permission handling, and data import mechanisms in Django applications.
